identificationModule.briefTitle: Comparison of Transthoracic Electrical Bioimpedance and Pulse Contour Analysis in Renal Transplantation Patients
identificationModule.officialTitle: Comparison of Transthoracic Electrical Bioimpedance and Pulse Contour Analysis in Renal Transplantation Patients: Analysis of Intraoperative Cardiac Output, Systemic Vascular Resistant and Stroke Volume Variation

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Hemodynamics monitoring using non-invasive transthoracic electrical bioimpedance ICON are compatible with standard invasive monitoring using pulse contour analysis EV1000

primaryOutcomes.description: Correlation between hemodynamic measured between devices: cardiac index, stroke volume index, systemic vascular resistance index, stroke volume index

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Changes in hemodynamic profiles: Cardiac Index
secondaryOutcomes.description: The trends of perioperative hemodynamic profiles during and after surgery: cardiac index in L/minutes/m\^2

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Changes in hemodynamic profiles: Stroke Volume Index
secondaryOutcomes.description: The trends of perioperative haemodynamic profiles during and after surgery: stroke volume index in mL/beat/m\^2

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Changes in hemodynamic profiles: Systemic Vascular Resistance Index
secondaryOutcomes.description: The trends of perioperative haemodynamic profiles during and after surgery: systemic vascular resistance index in dynes-second-m\^2/cm\^5

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Changes in hemodynamic profiles: Stroke Volume Variation
secondaryOutcomes.description: The trends of perioperative haemodynamic profiles during and after surgery: stroke volume variation in %

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* BMI 18.5 - 35 kg/m\^2

Exclusion Criteria:

* Heart function abnormalities (arrhythmia, AV block, using pacemaker, severe aorta stenosis)
* Morbid obesity
* Bradycardia (\< 50 bpm)
* Tachycardia (\> 110 bpm)
* refuse to participate
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Patients planned to undergo elective kidney transplantation surgery as recipient
